ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Tattered Gnomish Cloak
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, they can t have us gnomes killing other gnomes for a tinker item; that d be gnomicide and hurt our faction.  I did some exploring of the mining town in
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, they can't have us gnomes killing other gnomes for a tinker item;
that'd be gnomicide and hurt our faction. I did some exploring of the
mining town in Sola, but didn't see it. My bet it's on a mob. And like
Bronze items in High Keep, it may be possible to see it worn on a
gob...maybe, I mean.

Kilkin

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 20, 2000 6:30 PM
To: 'EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Tattered Gnomish Cloak


I'm hoping it's tattered because some gob ripped it off a poor gnome miner's
body after he killed him. Killing the gob will only be the beginning of the
revenge process.

Leagnomo

-----Original Message-----
From: Eric Baker [mailto:ericb76@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 20, 2000 4:33 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Tattered Gnomish Cloak


Okay, from what I hear the cloak drops in Sol A. Does that mean that
anyone who wants to tinker a Thermal Cloak(almost by definition a gnome)
has to camp a gnome to get it? Or do you really think they're gonna make
it drop from a gob?


Caldiren Doppleganger

46 Enchanter of Bertox
